about.title: About Kokand University
about.subtitle: Discover Your Dreams With Us
about.description1: Kokand University operates as a non-state higher educational institution in accordance with the Resolution No. 683 of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated August 17, 2019, 'On the establishment of Kokand University'. We are committed to providing world-class education and fostering innovation, research, and international collaboration.
about.description2: Located in Turkiston Street, Kokand, Fergana Region, our university combines modern facilities with traditional values, creating an ideal environment for academic excellence and personal growth.
